page.title: 16St. Martin's Caversham Park
page.content: {St. Martin's School}is a state primary school for{Roman Catholics.}It only has 5 teachers and 122 children. St. Martin's is a mixed school and the classes range from 21-30. This means that the teachers teach classes with different age groups.The age ranges from 5-11. The{girls' school uniform for winter is a green skirt, green cardigan, gold tie, and green blazer.The{boys' uniform}is a green jumper,grey shorts, white shirt, grey shoes and gold tie. The school has a swimming pool. Sometimes Caversham Park School has a swim in the pool. There is a small playing field for football and sports day.{My mother, {Mrs.Morgan}teaches the infants there and is deputy head of the school. She started there when I was about 3 years old. I went to St. Martin's when I was 4 years old and left when I was 11.
